GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.15.86
GSD.description:
perf/x86/intel/uncore: Fix reference count leak in sad_cfg_iio_topology()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.86 by commit 0021ef7dc6124e79ea6c1893c3c76d19700c2e12, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit c1777be3646b48f6638d8339ad270a27659adaa4. For more details please see the references link.
